mapper.insert: INSERT INTO site(siteno, img, imgsaved, thumb, imgsize, sitename, surl, word, cnt) VALUES(site_seq.nextval, #{img}, #{imgsaved}, #{thumb}, #{imgsize}, #{sitename}, #{surl}, #{word}, #{cnt})
mapper.select: SELECT siteno, img, imgsaved, thumb, imgsize, sitename, surl, word, cnt FROM site ORDER BY siteno ASC

SELECT siteno, img, imgsaved, thumb, imgsize, sitename, surl, word, cnt FROM site
WHERE sitename LIKE '%' || #{word} || '%' OR word LIKE '%' || #{word} || '%'
ORDER BY siteno ASC

SELECT COUNT(*) as cnt FROM site
WHERE sitename LIKE '%' || #{word} || '%' OR word LIKE '%' || #{word} || '%'
